import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Home, Box, Users, Warehouse, CalendarCheck, ChevronLeft, ChevronRight, } from 'lucide-react'; const Sidebar = () => { const location = useLocation(); const navLinks = [ { path: '/dashboard', label: 'Dashboard', icon: }, { path: '/inventory', label: 'Inventory', icon: }, { path: '/employee', label: 'Employees', icon: }, { path: '/warehouses', label: 'Manage Warehouses', icon: }, { path: '/attendance', label: 'Attendance Management', icon: }, ]; const linkClasses = (path) => `flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-all duration-200 ${ location.pathname === path ? 'bg-blue-600 text-white' : 'text-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-700 hover:text-white' }`; return (
{/* Heading */}

Dashboard Summary

{/* 🔍 Filter Section */}
setStartDate(e.target.value)} className="border p-2 rounded w-44" />
setEndDate(e.target.value)} className="border p-2 rounded w-44" />
{/* 📊 Summary Cards */}

Inventory Items

{summary.total_inventory}

Warehouses

{summary.total_warehouses}

Employees

{summary.total_employees}

Today's Attendance

✅ Present: {summary.attendance_today.present}

❌ Absent: {summary.attendance_today.absent}

🛌 Leave: {summary.attendance_today.leave}

{/* 📈 Charts Section */}
{/* Pie Chart */}

Attendance Overview

{summary.attendance_summary.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* Bar Chart */}

Inventory Quantities

{/* Line Chart */}

Employee Activity Trends

); }; export default Sidebar;
